author: sandra
body:
![globe of world](http://i.imgsafe.org/ff5980b565.jpg)

**Let me take you on a journey.** 

You don't need: 
>your passport, 
>your credit card 
>or to check in at any airports.

Just sit back, relax and enjoy the ride.

![aeroplane take off](http://i.imgsafe.org/ff7195be93.jpg)
Here we go.
![tunisia - el jem - where gladiator was filmed](http://i.imgsafe.org/ff7dfe3e27.jpg)
Tunisia: El Jem where the film "Gladiator" was made.
![goa - boat shipwrecked at candolim beach](http://i.imgsafe.org/ff8e705761.jpg)
Goa, India: Shipwrecked boat at Candolim Beach.
![goa - dancing cow](http://i.imgsafe.org/ff958db2f5.jpg)
Goa, India: A dancing cow.
![goa - the morning catch on benaulim beach](http://i.imgsafe.org/ff9e46d125.jpg)
Goa, India: the morning catch on Benaulim Beach.
![goa - two men and two pigs on a motorbike on a boat](http://i.imgsafe.org/ffa3a4eb3d.jpg)
Goa, India: two men and two pigs on a motorbike on a boat

![thailand - big standing buddha - bangkok](http://i.imgsafe.org/ffb3531cd5.jpg)
Thailand: Big Standing Buddha in Bangkok.
![thailand - chiang mai district - bath time for elephant](http://i.imgsafe.org/ffd1b492fa.jpg)
Thailand: bath time for the elephants in Chiang Mai district.
![thailand-james bond island](http://i.imgsafe.org/ffdbda26cb.jpg)
Thailand: James Bond Island.
![thailand - phi phi leh island where the beach was filmed](http://i.imgsafe.org/ffedd9905d.jpg)
Thailand: Phi Phi Leh island where "The Beach" was filmed.

![malaysia - petronas twin towers kuala lumpur](http://i.imgsafe.org/000ca2d6ac.jpg)
Malaysia: Petronas Twin Towers in Kuala Lumpur.
![malaysia - view from menara tower kl](http://i.imgsafe.org/001ce673e1.jpg)
Malaysia: View from the Menara Tower in Kuala Lumpur.
![malaysia - window cleaners at menara tower kl](http://i.imgsafe.org/0028bec131.jpg)
Malaysia: Window cleaners at Menara Tower!
![malaysia - f1 safety first](http://i.imgsafe.org/002ebb05e1.jpg)
Malaysia: Safety first at the F1 race.
![malaysia - chocolate f1 car](http://i.imgsafe.org/0034b1ecbe.jpg)
Malaysia:  No top speeds in this chocolate version.

![hong kong by night](http://i.imgsafe.org/003a9aa64d.jpg)
Hong Kong: City by night.
![hong kong- peak tram](http://i.imgsafe.org/00428a832c.jpg)
Hong Kong: Peak Tram.

![bali- barong and keris dance](http://i.imgsafe.org/0052050770.jpg)
Bali: Barong and Keris dance.
![bali-volcano and lake at mount batur](http://i.imgsafe.org/005a5d43cb.jpg)
Bali: Volcano and lake at Mount Batur.
![bali-paddy fields](http://i.imgsafe.org/00618877e9.jpg)
Bali: Paddy fields.

![australia-bush fire](http://i.imgsafe.org/00699eeeed.jpg)
Australia: bush fire.
![australia-bungle bungle range from small plane](http://i.imgsafe.org/0076c3da6a.jpg)
Australia: Bungle Bungle Mountain Range.
![australia - fruit bats katherine gorge](http://i.imgsafe.org/008211ee87.jpg)
Australia: large fruit bats at Katherine Gorge.
![australia - ayers rock by sunset](http://i.imgsafe.org/0087a43117.jpg)
Australia: Ayers rock at sunset.
![australia - ayers rock at close range](http://i.imgsafe.org/008f52e9ef.jpg)
Australia: Ayers rock up close.
![australia - the twelve apostles](http://i.imgsafe.org/009a27b0b5.jpg)
Australia: The Twelve Apostles.

![new zealand - north island](http://i.imgsafe.org/00a64b2a03.jpg)
New Zealand: the beauty of the North Island.
![new zealand-queenstown](http://i.imgsafe.org/00ac08bf26.jpg)
New Zealand: Queenstown.
![new zealand - view from bobs peak](http://i.imgsafe.org/00b2330bb9.jpg)
New Zealand: view from Bobs Peak.
![new zealand - milford sound](http://i.imgsafe.org/00ba4389b2.jpg)
New Zealand: Milford Sound.

![buenos aires- city tour](http://i.imgsafe.org/00c405f6e6.jpg)
Buenos Aires: city tour.

![rio de janeiro](http://i.imgsafe.org/00cb422e59.jpg)
Rio de Janeiro.
![rio de janeiro - cable car to sugar loaf mountain](http://i.imgsafe.org/00d180654d.jpg)
Rio de Janeiro: cable car to Sugar Loaf Mountain.

![aeroplane landing](http://i.imgsafe.org/00df458d6a.jpg)
and we have landed back home on steemit.  
I hope you don't have too much jet lag.
title: Around the World in 80 seconds
